translation.en: …and laying a finger aside of my nose,
translation.es: …y con un dedo a un lado de mi nariz,

translation.en: I gave him a nod and up the chimney I rose!
translation.es: le hice un gesto y por la chimenea subí feliz.

translation.en: I sprang to my sleigh, gave my flight team a whistle,
translation.es: Corrí al trineo, le silbé al equipo de vuelo,

translation.en: and away we all flew like the down of a thistle.
translation.es: y volando nos despegamos del suelo.

translation.en: But I gave him a shout, ere we drove out of sight,
translation.es: Y les grité una cosa, sin muchos derroches,

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all…
And to all a good night.
- Yay!  - Yes! Ho ho ho ho!
- - Oh, would you look at that.
- Time for bed, little ones. - Aww…
Come on, Santa, one more story.
I don't think so. What would your parents say?
translation.es: No lo creo. ¿Qué dirán sus papás?

translation.en: They won't care.
translation.es: - No les importará. - No les diremos.

translation.en: - We won't tell. - Please?
translation.es: - No les importará. - No les diremos. ¿Por favor?

translation.en: Ho ho ho ho! You must have heard every Christmas story there is by now.
translation.es: Seguramente ya conocen todos los cuentos de Navidad.

translation.en: Although, there is one tale you may not have heard.
translation.es: Aunque hay un cuento que quizá no hayan oído.

translation.en: Honestly, it's kind of…
crazy.
You kids wouldn't want to hear a crazy Christmas story, would you?
translation.es: No quieren un loco cuento de Navidad, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Yeah!
Once upon a time, there was a race of aliens known as Klepts.
translation.es: Había una vez una raza de alienígenas conocidos como klepts.

translation.en: Long ago, they were colorful creatures from a beautiful planet,
translation.es: Eran unas criaturas coloridas de un planeta hermoso.

translation.en: - but they grew greedy. - Ah!
They plundered all their home planet - had to offer… - Hmm. Hmm. Hmm?
translation.es: Saquearon todo lo que su planeta ofrecía…

translation.en: - …and their color faded away. - Aw…
So, they took to the stars…
moving from galaxy to galaxy,
swindling, stealing and snatching whatever they could.
translation.es: estafando y robando lo que pudieran.

translation.en: The poor Klepts had no concept of kindness or joy.
translation.es: Los pobres klepts no sabían de bondad o alegría.

translation.en: All they ever felt was greed.
But the more the Klepts had,
the more they wanted.
They even stole from one another!
- Ah! - X was the smallest of the Klepts,
translation.es: X era el más chico de los klepts,

translation.en: - but he was also the sneakiest. - Ah.
translation.es: pero también era el más astuto.

translation.en: - But no matter how clever X was… - Huh?
translation.es: Pero sin importar cuán inteligente fuera,

translation.en: - …he was still the smallest. -
X was an excellent thief…
- but because of his size… - Ah!
…the other Klepts - never took him seriously. -
translation.es: los demás klepts no lo tomaban en serio.

translation.en: The Klepts' supreme leader was a nasty piece of work,
translation.es: La líder suprema de los klepts era desagradable,

translation.en: - mean, greedy, and dangerous. -
Her name was Z.
And Z was about to reveal - her most diabolical plan yet. -
translation.es: Y Z estaba a punto de revelar su plan más diabólico.

translation.en: Klepts, a fabulous treasure is within our grasp.
translation.es: Klepts, un tesoro fabuloso está a nuestro alcance.

translation.en: This is Earth,
the most stuff- filled planet we've ever seen.
translation.es: el planeta más lleno de cosas que hemos visto.

translation.en: - Alone and unguarded… - Ooh!
…in the vastness of space.
You almost feel sorry for it.
Almost.
We will build the ultimate weapon: the Gyrotron!
At the magnetic North Pole of the planet,
translation.es: En el polo norte magnético del planeta,

translation.en: - it will obliterate the planet's gravity. -
All the stuff on the surface will float out into space,
translation.es: Las cosas en la superficie flotarán hacia el espacio

translation.en: where we will be waiting to snatch it up.
We will stuff their stuff into our stuff chambers,
translation.es: ¡Meteremos sus cosas en nuestras cámaras para cosas,

translation.en: and then their stuff will be our stuff!
translation.es: y luego sus cosas serán nuestras cosas!

translation.en: One of you will go to Earth and assemble the Gyrotron.
translation.es: Uno de ustedes irá a la Tierra a armar el Girotrón.

translation.en: And let me remind you that failure will be…
translation.es: Y les recuerdo que el fracaso será…

translation.en: frowned upon.
Any volunteers?
X knew that if he could steal more stuff
translation.es: X sabía que si robaba más cosas

translation.en: - than any Klept in Klept history… - Hmm!
…they would finally be forced to take him seriously.
translation.es: se verían obligados a tomarlo en serio.

translation.en: You're volunteering?
I was hoping for someone a bit taller.
translation.es: Esperaba a alguien un poco más alto.

translation.en: Okay, the job is yours, little Klept.
translation.es: El trabajo es tuyo, pequeño klept.

translation.en: Impress me.
X had been assigned a Semi- Automatic- Multi- Tasking- Unit,
translation.es: Le asignaron un Sujeto Automático Multitarea Unitario,

translation.en: - or SAMTU. -
And little did X realize just how helpful SAMTU would turn out to be.
translation.es: X no sabía cuán útil resultaría ser SAMTU.

translation.en: Of all the places to build their weapon of doom,
translation.es: De todos los lugares para construir su arma,

translation.en: the Klepts chose the North Pole…
translation.es: los klepts eligieron el Polo Norte…

translation.en: right in the heart of Christmas Town…
translation.es: en el corazón de Ciudad Navidad…

translation.en: just two days before Christmas Eve!
And who would be the first line of defense
translation.es: ¿Y quién sería la primera línea de defensa

translation.en: against this alien invasion?
A handful of elves.
Hold still, let me put your ribbon on.
Now, say ah.
Mom, help! Try your father's auto- bow.
translation.es: - ¡Mamá, ayuda! - Prueba el aparato de tu papá.

translation.en: Point it at the puppy and push the button.
translation.es: Solo apunta y aprieta el botón.

translation.en: His gadgets are great… mostly.
translation.es: Sus aparatos son geniales… casi siempre.

translation.en: Yay! You look perfect!
- Mom, we can't give this one away. - Look at those eyes.
translation.es: Mamá, no podemos regalar a esta. Mira esos ojos.

translation.en: - Giving is what Christmas is all about. - I know.
translation.es: La Navidad se trata de dar. Lo sé.

translation.en: But she's such a good girl!
translation.es: Pero es una chica muy buena.

translation.en: When X laid eyes on Christmas Town,
he didn't see magic and wonder.
He only saw all the stuff
he could steal.
It's in a Klept's nature to steal,
translation.es: Robar es innato para los klepts,

translation.en: - so, Christmas Town was a paradise for X. - Wow!
translation.es: así que la ciudad era un paraíso para X.

translation.en: As SAMTU led him to the precise spot where they would build the Gyrotron,
translation.es: Mientras SAMTU lo guiaba a donde construirían el Girotrón,

translation.en: X couldn't help but pilfer.
X didn't know it, but he had arrived on a particularly special night.
translation.es: X no lo sabía, pero había llegado en una noche especial.

translation.en: On the other side of town, I was presenting our newest invention.
translation.es: Al otro lado de la ciudad, yo estaba presentando nuestro nuevo invento.

translation.en: You're on, big guy. Three, two…
Hello- ho- ho, everyone!
And thank you for coming.
I know how busy you all are, but you're my family,
translation.es: Sé lo ocupados que están, pero son mi familia,

translation.en: and I have something incredible to show you.
translation.es: y tengo algo increíble que mostrarles.

translation.en: Everybody loves a baby! They're soft and cute.
translation.es: ¡Todos aman a los bebés! Son suaves y lindos.

translation.en: So, it's no wonder the planet is bursting with more kids than ever before.
translation.es: Se entiende que el planeta esté más lleno de niños que nunca.

translation.en: Friends, we need a faster method for delivering gifts.
translation.es: Necesitamos un método más rápido para entregar regalos.

translation.en: I had a vision, a dream!
I saw us bringing gifts to every girl and boy on the face of the Earth
translation.es: ¡Vi que llevábamos regalos a cada niña y niño de la Tierra

translation.en: at the speed of light!
translation.es: a la velocidad de la luz!

translation.en: And with the help of our lead mechanic, Obie,
- we have made my dream a reality! -
Elves, snowmen, citizens of the North Pole,
translation.es: Elfos, muñecos de nieve, ciudadanos del Polo Norte,

translation.en: may I present to you,
the deluxe, fully loaded,
translation.es: el trineo de lujo, desafiante de la gravedad:

translation.en: gravity- defying Santa Super Sleigh!
translation.es: el trineo de lujo, desafiante de la gravedad: ¡el Supertrineo de Santa!

translation.en: I named it myself.
- My dad made that! - Yes, he did.
translation.es: - ¡Mi papá hizo eso! - Sí, así es.

translation.en: - Boo! - Boo!
Okay, here we go.
- Hi! Oh! Oh, that's not good. -
- Whoa! - I have a feeling that this year will be the most crackerjack Christm-- Ahh!
translation.es: Tengo la sensación de que esta Navidad será la mejor…

translation.en: - Whoa! Santa! Watch out! -
Not good.
Let me turn the… No! Ah! Whoa!
Okay, okay, no, it's okay. No, no, no, no.
Santa?
Santa, are you okay?
Well, that wasn't part of the plan, but it was fun!
translation.es: Pues, eso no estaba planeado, pero fue divertido.

translation.en: Everyone okay?
Sorry, the light- speed booster still isn't quite up to--
translation.es: Perdón, el propulsor de velocidad no…

translation.en: Christmas Eve is tomorrow!
How will we deliver gifts without the Super Sleigh?
There's plenty of time!
By midnight tomorrow, the sleigh will be in perfect working order.
translation.es: Mañana a medianoche, el trineo estará en perfecto estado.

translation.en: I have full faith in Obie.
Okay.
Yeah.
- Are you okay? - I'm fine. I just--
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Estoy bien. Debo volver a trabajar.

translation.en: I really gotta get back to work.
translation.es: Estoy bien. Debo volver a trabajar.

translation.en: Wait, you're not coming home?
I can't, I… I'm sorry.
The sleigh is my responsibility, and I can't let Santa down.
translation.es: Es mi responsabilidad, no puedo decepcionar a Santa.

translation.en: But I'll be home later to tuck you in. I promise.
translation.es: Pero iré a darte las buenas noches. Lo prometo.

translation.en: Okay, I understand.
Noelle, I'm… I'm trying my best.
We know you are.
I'll make it up to her. I'll find her the best Christmas gift ever this year.
translation.es: Lo compensaré. Le daré el mejor regalo de Navidad.

translation.en: The only gift she wants is you.
translation.es: Tú eres lo único que quiere.

translation.en: You get that sleigh fixed and come home to us.
translation.es: Arregla ese trineo y ven a casa.

translation.en: - Mama. - Papa.
Mama.
Mama.
It was just one more day until Christmas.
translation.es: Solo faltaba un día para Navidad.

translation.en: My flight crew and I made the final plans for our first light- speed delivery.
translation.es: Hicimos los planes finales para la primera entrega a velocidad de la luz.

translation.en: But not everyone was feeling the Christmas spirit.
translation.es: Pero no todos sentían el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: And back home, Obie's family was missing him.
translation.es: Y en casa, la familia de Obie lo extrañaba.

translation.en: One downside of the gravity- destroying Gyrotron
translation.es: Una desventaja del Girotrón que elimina la gravedad

translation.en: is that some assembly is required.
Whenever a Klept is completely out of options,
translation.es: Cuando un klept se queda sin opciones

translation.en: their final resort is to play dead.
translation.es: su último recurso es hacerse el muerto.

translation.en: It was X's job to assemble the Gyrotron,
translation.es: Armar el Girotrón era trabajo de X,

translation.en: - but he had better things to do. - Hmm.
translation.es: pero tenía mejores cosas que hacer.

translation.en: So, he reprogrammed SAMTU to do the job for him.
translation.es: Así que reprogramó a SAMTU para que hiciera el trabajo por él.

translation.en: X knew his mission was top priority,
translation.es: X sabía que su misión era la prioridad,

translation.en: but he couldn't stop thinking - about Christmas Town. - Ooh.
translation.es: pero no podía dejar de pensar en Ciudad Navidad.

translation.en: Up above him, there was so much stuff just waiting,
translation.es: Encima de él había muchas cosas esperando,

translation.en: begging, to be taken.
I don't know what's wrong,
but the light- speed booster won't work.
I know my calculations are right, but…
- Maybe they're not. -
I'm sure they're perfect.
- If anyone can do this, it's you. -
translation.es: Si alguien puede hacer esto, eres tú.

translation.en: - I'll let you get back to work. - Okay.
Thanks, Santa.
Hello?
Somebody there?
Hello?
Oh, just a toy. What are you, a doll?
Mama.
- Nice. - Papa.
Hey, hey! I know someone who's gonna just love you.
translation.es: ¡Oye! Conozco a alguien que te amará.

translation.en: Holly? You up?
Good night, Sugarplum.
Sorry I haven't been, uh…
I'm just sorry.
Merry Christmas.
- In that moment… - Huh?
…X felt something he'd never felt before.
translation.es: X sintió algo que nunca había sentido.

translation.en: - Something he didn't even have a word for. - Ah…
translation.es: Algo que ni siquiera sabía nombrar.

translation.en: But we do.
- It was love, pure and sweet. - Ah.
X wanted to forget about this strange feeling.
translation.es: X quería olvidar ese extraño sentimiento.

translation.en: But like it or not, he was trapped.
translation.es: Pero aunque no quisiera, estaba atrapado.

translation.en: Who are you?
Dad, Dad, it's perfect!
How did you find it?
Where's Dad?
Work? That's okay.
He needs to fix the sleigh, I know.
translation.es: Debe arreglar el trineo, lo sé.

translation.en: Oh, did you see what Dad got me?
I did not. It's a doll!
And I don't quite know what kind of doll,
translation.es: Y no sé qué clase de muñeco,

translation.en: but I think there's something special about it.
There's nothing quite like Christmas Eve in Christmas Town.
translation.es: No hay nada como Nochebuena en Ciudad Navidad.

translation.en: There's a spirit of joy that spreads through every household.
translation.es: Hay un espíritu de alegría en todos los hogares.

translation.en: A deep appreciation for those we love
translation.es: Un profundo aprecio por quienes amamos

translation.en: and the precious time we get to spend together.
translation.es: y el valioso tiempo que pasamos juntos.

translation.en: These feelings were brand new to X
translation.es: Esos sentimientos eran nuevos para X

translation.en: - and made him feel awfully strange. -
translation.es: y lo hacían sentir muy extraño.

translation.en: - And as the day went on… -
…X witnessed everyday acts of kindness and generosity.
translation.es: X vio actos cotidianos de bondad y generosidad.

translation.en: He saw how the elves loved to sing songs,
translation.es: Vio que a los elfos les encantaba cantar,

translation.en: give gifts, to smile and laugh.
What utterly strange creatures these elves were.
translation.es: Qué criaturas tan extrañas eran estos elfos.

translation.en: There was so much wonderful stuff to steal!
They should be taking, he thought.
Yet they were not stealing a thing!
It all made no sense to X.
- Are you leaving, too? - Huh?
You don't have to pretend.
translation.es: No tienes que fingir. Sabía que caminabas.

translation.en: I knew you could walk. You're not very good at hiding it.
translation.es: No tienes que fingir. Sabía que caminabas. No lo ocultas muy bien.

translation.en: It's okay. You can have whatever you want.
translation.es: Está bien. Llévate lo que quieras.

translation.en: It's just stuff.
- Why are you leaving? - Um…
Do you have to go to work, too?
That's okay. I understand.
Wait here.
- - Here you go. Nobody likes being alone, especially on Christmas.
translation.es: Toma. A nadie le gusta estar solo, sobre todo en Navidad.

translation.en: X finally understood how wonderful it was to receive a gift.
translation.es: X entendió lo maravilloso que era recibir regalos.

translation.en: - It was so much better than stealing! -
Because a present wasn't just meaningless stuff.
translation.es: Porque un regalo no era una cosa sin sentido.

translation.en: It meant someone cared about him.
An act of love like that?
Well, it didn't just change X on the inside.
translation.es: Bueno, no solo cambió a X por dentro.

translation.en: X felt amazing!
And he wanted, more than anything, to share this feeling,
translation.es: Y quería, más que nada, compartir ese sentimiento,

translation.en: to show Holly that he cared about her just as much.
translation.es: mostrarle a Holly que ella también le importaba a él.

translation.en: But what could X give her that she didn't already have?
translation.es: Pero ¿qué podría darle que no tuviera ya?

translation.en: As they raced through Christmas Town,
- X told Holly everything. - Whoa!
translation.es: X le contó todo a Holly.

translation.en: He told her about the Klepts and Supreme Leader Z
translation.es: Le contó sobre los klepts, la líder Z y su misión en la Tierra.

translation.en: - and what he was sent here to do. - What?
translation.es: Le contó sobre los klepts, la líder Z y su misión en la Tierra. ¿Qué?

translation.en: He told her he wasn't going to do that anymore.
translation.es: Pero le dijo que ya no iba a hacerlo.

translation.en: Instead, he'd come up with a wonderful new plan, just for Holly.
translation.es: Tenía un nuevo plan maravilloso solo para Holly.

translation.en: X, look out!
Be careful.
With SAMTU successfully reprogrammed, X was ready to begin his plan.
translation.es: Con la reprogramación de SAMTU, X estaba listo para comenzar su plan.

translation.en: Dad? Dad?
I don't know where my dad is.
translation.es: No sé dónde está mi papá.

translation.en: With a new sleigh, our delivery time will be cut by 90%!
translation.es: En el trineo nuevo, tardaremos mucho menos.

translation.en: Uh… Santa?
Obie? Is everything okay?
Well, not exactly.
I… I couldn't fix it.
I tried everything. It just won't work. My math must have been wrong, and I…
translation.es: Intenté todo. No funciona. Mis cálculos deben estar mal…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I… I failed you, and I ruined Christmas.
translation.es: Lo siento. Te fallé y arruiné la Navidad.

translation.en: I've put a lot of pressure on you this year, haven't I, old friend?
translation.es: Te presioné mucho este año, ¿verdad, viejo amigo?

translation.en: I have, and I'm sorry.
How about we look at this sleigh together and see what we can do.
translation.es: ¿Y si lo revisamos juntos a ver qué podemos hacer?

translation.en: What do you say?
Hey, Santa?
Uh, just in case we can't get the sleigh to work, do you have a plan B?
translation.es: Si no funciona el trineo, ¿tienes un plan B?

translation.en: Ho- ho- ho! Nope.
Fixing the Super Sleigh might have been difficult for Obie,
translation.es: Arreglar el Supertrineo era difícil para Obie,

translation.en: but for SAMTU, light- speed engine repair - was well within his programming. - Ah.
translation.es: pero para SAMTU, reparar motores era parte de su programación.

translation.en: You did it! You did it!
Obie, you were pranking me!
How wonderful!
Uh… I, uh… Just a second, Santa.
Dad!
- What's going on? How-- - It was X! The doll you gave me.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo…? - ¡Fue X! El muñeco que me diste.

translation.en: He's not a doll, he's an alien! He came to steal.
translation.es: - Sí. - ¡Es un extraterrestre! - Bien. - Vino a robar.

translation.en: But I gave him a puppy, and he changed colors! And he has a robot.
translation.es: Le di un perro y cambió de color. Y tiene un robot.

translation.en: The robot was doing bad things.
X reprogrammed him, then we came here, and his robot fixed the sleigh!
translation.es: Pero X lo reprogramó, y su robot arregló el trineo.

translation.en: I… But why?
So we can all be together on Christmas.
translation.es: Para que estemos juntos en Navidad.

translation.en: That was X's present to me.
translation.es: Fue el regalo de X para mí.

translation.en: Thank you.
X was the first Klept in history - to give a gift… - Hmm.
translation.es: X fue el primer klept de la historia en dar un regalo

translation.en: …and it felt even better than he had hoped.
translation.es: y se sintió mejor de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: The little alien was imbued with the spirit of Christmas.
translation.es: El alienígena estaba impregnado del espíritu navideño.

translation.en: The fully- loaded Super Santa Sleigh was ready to rip!
And Obie and Holly were together.
translation.es: Y Obie y Holly estaban juntos.

translation.en: A perfect, happy ending for our Christmas tale.
translation.es: Un final perfecto para nuestro cuento de Navidad.

translation.en: I never said this Christmas story had a happy ending.
translation.es: Pero nunca dije que este cuento tuviera un final feliz.

translation.en: - I said this story was crazy! -
Bet you forgot about old Z, didn't you?
translation.es: Se olvidaron de la vieja Z, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, she didn't forget,
and was here to finish the job.
translation.es: y vino a terminar el trabajo.

translation.en: Activate the Gyrotron!
Destroy Earth's gravity and take everything!
translation.es: ¡Destruyan la gravedad de la Tierra y tomen todo!

translation.en: Alien attack! Retreat!
There's too many of--
Secure the north wall with the Ice Brigade!
Aerial reindeer support to the west!
The battle for Christmas Town had begun.
translation.es: La batalla por Ciudad Navidad había empezado.

translation.en: - Mom's at the kennel! We have to go! - You're right. Stay close!
translation.es: - Mamá está en la perrera. ¡Debemos ir! - Sí. ¡Ven!

translation.en: X knew that the Gyrotron - could still be activated… - Ah!
translation.es: X sabía que el Girotrón aún podía activarse.

translation.en: - …so he sent SAMTU to check on it. -
translation.es: Así que envió a SAMTU a revisarlo.

translation.en: Get the sleigh to safety!
Nobody messes with my holiday!
translation.es: ¡Nadie se mete con mi día festivo!

translation.en: Oh! Oh, boy! This complicates things.
- Let's round them all up. -
Come here, little guy.
Heads up. Puppy coming your way.
This is kind of fun, once you get used to it.
- - What's wrong? We got this, Mom.
Yes!
Will someone please blast that miserable thing out of the sky?
- Oh, no! -
- - Forget about it.
It's what we do.
It was a devastating loss.
Christmas Town had fallen,
and the Klepts were triumphant.
Mama.
X!
Come closer so I can see you.
You deviated from my plan.
Klepts!
I would like you to meet your new - Vice Supreme Leader! - Huh?
translation.es: ¡Quiero presentarles a su nuevo vice líder supremo!

translation.en: X has shown more unscrupulous treachery - than all of you combined. - Huh.
translation.es: X ha mostrado más traición sin escrúpulos que todos ustedes juntos.

translation.en: He assembled the Gyrotron,
gained the trust of these moronic creatures
translation.es: se ganó la confianza de estas criaturas tontas

translation.en: and led us right to the best stuff we have ever seen!
translation.es: y nos llevó a las mejores cosas que hemos visto.

translation.en: - - Once upon a time, this would have been everything X could have ever wanted.
translation.es: Antes, esto habría sido todo lo que X hubiera querido.

translation.en: But when he saw Holly,
X knew what he had to do.
translation.es: X supo lo que tenía que hacer.

translation.en: - - What are you doing?
What in the-- Ah!
What's happening to me?
I feel so… warm.
- - It's… It's…
it's wonderful!
For so long there had been an emptiness - inside the Klepts… -
translation.es: Por mucho tiempo, hubo un vacío dentro de los klepts

translation.en: …that no amount of taking could ever fill.
translation.es: que el robo nunca pudo llenar.

translation.en: - - Merry Christmas.
- Hmm… Hmm! Aw… - But now, thanks to X,
that hollow space was filled with love…
translation.es: ese vacío estaba lleno de amor…

translation.en: and transformed by the spirit of Christmas.
translation.es: y se transformó por el espíritu de la Navidad.

translation.en: Yes, it was this new concept of giving that changed the Klepts.
translation.es: Sí, fue este nuevo concepto de dar lo que cambió a los klepts.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
They were restored to the colorful creatures they once were.
translation.es: Volvieron a ser las criaturas coloridas que habían sido.

translation.en: It's Christmas.
The sun's coming up.
Children will wake up, and there'll be nothing under their trees!
translation.es: ¡Los niños despertarán y no encontrarán nada!

translation.en: And there's not enough time to deliver the gifts.
translation.es: No hay tiempo para llevarles regalos.

translation.en: Yes, that little X surprised them all that day.
translation.es: Sí, el pequeño X los sorprendió a todos.

translation.en: He may have been the smallest of Klepts, but it turns out
translation.es: Era el más pequeño de los klepts, pero tenía el corazón más grande.

translation.en: - he had the biggest heart. - Ah!
translation.es: pero tenía el corazón más grande.

translation.en: And as dawn broke on Christmas morning,
translation.es: Y mientras amanecía el día de Navidad,

translation.en: the world could never have predicted just how special,
translation.es: el mundo nunca hubiera podido predecir cuán especial,

translation.en: how unique, how…
…alien it would be.
The Klepts helped deliver toys in an armada of spaceships.
translation.es: Los klepts ayudaron a entregar juguetes en naves espaciales.

translation.en: Faster than the speed of light!
Just like my vision!
Sort of.
It was all thanks to a little girl
translation.es: Todo fue gracias a una niña pequeña,

translation.en: and an even littler alien,
translation.es: a un alienígena aún más pequeño,

translation.en: and a whole lot of love.
And that is the story of the very first Alien Christmas.
translation.es: Y esa es la historia de la primera Navidad extraterrestre.

translation.en: The end.
